mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods(goodsid, category, productname, description, size, price, stockquantity, issoldout, filename, filesize) VALUES(#{goodsid}, #{category}, #{productname}, #{description}, #{size}, #{price}, #{stockquantity}, #{issoldout}, #{filename}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT goodsid, category, productname, description, size, price, stockquantity, issoldout, filename, filesize FROM goods ORDER BY productname
SELECT goodsid, category, productname, description, size, price, stockquantity, issoldout FROM goods WHERE productname LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY productname
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET category = #{category}, productname = #{productname}, description = #{description}, size = #{size}, price = #{price}, stockquantity = #{stockquantity}, issoldout = #{issoldout}, filename = #{filename}, filesize = #{filesize} WHERE goodsid = #{goodsid}
